scenes.title: The Threshold of Ink and Bone
scenes.text: You step into the cursed library, its arched doors groaning like the final breath of a dying epoch, under the baleful gaze of a blood-red moon that stains the night with crimson omens. Howling sounds pierce the air, not from wolves but from the very tomes that line the walls, their leather spines whispering forgotten agonies. The air thickens with the scent of aged parchment and something metallic, like spilled vitae. Your mind swirls with doubts—why have you come to this repository of forbidden knowledge, where realities bend and time devours itself? Shadows dance in the candlelight, mocking your intrusion.

scenes.title: The Luminous Codex Beckons
scenes.text: You approach the central pedestal, where a codex pulses with an inner luminescence, its pages veined with symbols that writhe like living serpents. The blood-red moon casts elongated shadows that twist into grotesque forms, and the howling intensifies, echoing your accelerating heartbeat. Forbidden knowledge tempts you—visions of eternal power flood your thoughts, but a distortion ripples through reality, the floor tilting as if time itself recoils. Your fingers hover, trembling; do you dare unleash what slumbers within?

scenes.title: Alcoves of Whispering Secrets
scenes.text: You delve into the left alcoves, where dust-laden shelves cradle volumes bound in what feels like flayed skin. The howling morphs into sibilant murmurs, promising revelations that could unravel the cosmos. A reality distortion manifests—mirrors reflect not your form but fractured versions of yourself, trapped in eternal loops of agony. Blood-red moonlight seeps through cracks, illuminating symbols that burn into your retinas. Your mind fractures; thoughts loop, repeating the same dread question: escape or succumb?

scenes.title: Galleries of Suspended Time
scenes.text: You climb the spiral staircase, each step echoing like a heartbeat in the void, leading to upper galleries where time seems suspended in viscous amber. The blood-red moon looms larger through vaulted windows, and howling winds carry the cries of chronophages—entities that feast on temporal threads. Reality distorts; you glimpse loops of your own ascent, repeating infinitely. Forbidden knowledge dangles from chained books, their pages dripping ink that forms prophetic puddles. Your sanity frays, internal voices urging descent or deeper plunge.

scenes.title: Incantation of Fractured Epochs
scenes.text: You utter the incantation, words slithering from your lips like venomous eels, and time loops violently—reality warps, replaying your approach in a crimson haze under the blood-red moon. Howling chronophages manifest, their forms amorphous horrors with maws of shattered clocks. They tear into your flesh, gore spraying in elaborate arcs, bones cracking with symphonic precision. Your mind screams in looped torment: this is the price of forbidden knowledge, an eternal cycle of evisceration and rebirth.

scenes.title: Desperate Search for Egress
scenes.text: You resist the codex's allure, scanning for an exit, but the library's architecture shifts in a reality distortion, walls bleeding ink that forms howling faces. The blood-red moon pulses like a wounded heart, casting shadows that claw at your heels. Forbidden knowledge whispers temptations, but you press on, your thoughts a maelstrom of fear: will this labyrinth ever release you, or are you doomed to wander its veins forever?

scenes.title: Pulsating Tome's Embrace
scenes.text: You grasp the pulsating tome, its cover throbbing like a necrotic heart, unleashing a time loop that replays your intrusion in visceral detail. Reality distorts, mirrors shattering into shards that slice your skin, blood welling in ruby rivulets, gore mingling with ink. Howling echoes your screams, the blood-red moon witnessing your dismemberment. Internal monologues cycle: knowledge's cost is this eternal flaying, a symphony of pain without end.

scenes.text: You unlock the chained volume, chains clattering like skeletal fingers, revealing pages that ignite a reality distortion—time loops entwine you, forcing reliving of ascents where chronophages rend your limbs, viscera spilling in elaborate patterns, bones splintering with wet cracks. The blood-red moon bathes the gore in symbolic crimson, howling winds carrying your echoed agonies. Your mind fractures: is this ascension or mere dissolution into the library's maw?

scenes.text: You peer over the railing, the abyss below swirling with distorted realities, time loops manifesting as spectral versions of yourself plummeting eternally. Howling chronophages rise, their tendrils lashing out, tearing flesh in gory explosions, entrails uncoiling like forbidden scrolls. The blood-red moon illuminates the carnage, shadows dancing in macabre revelry. Your thoughts loop in despair: the void calls, promising oblivion or twisted rebirth.

scenes.title: Embrace of Eternal Cycles
scenes.text: You embrace the loop, delving into its depths, but the chronophages consume you wholly—flesh rends in meticulous detail, muscles peeling like parchment, blood fountains arcing symbolically under the blood-red moon. Howling becomes your own voice, reality distorting into infinite repetitions of your demise. Forbidden knowledge floods your shattering mind: you are now the loop, eternally devoured and reformed in gore-soaked perpetuity.

scenes.text: You fight the cycle, willpower clashing against the distortion, shattering the loop with a visceral explosion—chronophages burst in sprays of ichor and shattered gears, your wounds healing in reverse as reality stabilizes. The blood-red moon dims, howling fades to silence. Forbidden knowledge retreats, leaving you with a profound revelation: the library's curse is self-inflicted, broken by denial. You emerge transformed, the doors yielding to your escape.

Blood paints the walls under the blood-red moon's gaze, howling your dirge. Your mind dissolves: this knowledge was never meant for mortals, only for the void's eternal hunger.

The blood-red moon crowns you, howling your apotheosis. Knowledge floods: you transcend mortality, becoming a chronophage lord, ruling the library's eternal cycles.

The blood-red moon fades, howling your dissolution. Your essence scatters: absorbed into the library's core, a fragment of its endless madness.

scenes.text: Jumping into the abyss, reality distorts into infinite loops of descent, chronophages feasting endlessly—your body shreds repeatedly, skin flaying in layers, blood misting the void under the blood-red moon's eternal watch. Howling becomes silence as madness claims you: forever falling, knowledge's prisoner in perpetual torment.

The blood-red moon wanes, howling ceases. Revelation dawns: the library's curse is illusion, dispelled by confrontation. You exit, forever marked but free.
